attributes.action: Increase Benefits, Employment Rights, and Business Funding for Disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Disabled people are told that they are a low priority for Business Funding, & if over 50 have no chance of funding of an enterprise,  have no rights to refuse training forced upom them by Job centres without loosing benefits, and have rates of benefits that are now behind everyone elses over 50% live below the poverty index, (no winter payments, no inflation index increases), we are regularly suspended from benefits for no reasonable reason other than media pressure.
We have rights and want the govt to  make it clear that we are a part of society & include us in policies to maximise our potential, maximise our earnings, & allow us a good quality of life.
